```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(fs); library(dplyr); library(ggplot2); library(readr)
  library(skimr); library(readxl); library(rio); library(janitor)
  source("../R/load_data.R"); source("../R/cleaning.R"); source("../R/eda.R")
  source("../R/modeling_regression.R"); source("../R/modeling_classification.R")
  source("../R/timeseries.R")
})
DF <- load_data(params$data_path)
DF <- clean_basic(DF)
run_eda(DF, target = params$target)
